text: This great scene in The Shining where Shelly Duvall interrupts Jack Nicholson, and he gives this angry frustrated speech about how you can't just interrupt a writer. He's going crazy, she has no clue what he's saying. Listen to the music, it tells the story from his point of view. Every creative person can relate. It was Stephen King and Stanley Kubrick pleading with the world to just let them create.
